title: # 275 - Ali Siddiq & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Ali Siddiq and we talk about being bullied, how not to get mugged, the time Ali judged a body building competition in prison, and the first time Ali heard Pink Floyd.

Ali's brand new special "Its Bigger Than These Bars" premiers Friday, Feb 23rd on Comedy Central.

Follow Ali on Twitter @Ali_speaks

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
